story.title: The Midnight Garden
story.author: Isabella Crane
story.description: You inherit a Victorian mansion with a garden that only blooms at midnight. When you meet the enigmatic gardener who tends it, you discover he

nodes.title: The Inheritance
nodes.narration: The letter from the estate lawyer arrived on your thirtieth birthday. A great-aunt you never knew existed has left you Thornewood Manor—a crumbling Victorian mansion on the edge of a forgotten town. The condition is strange: you must live there for one full moon cycle before deciding whether to keep it. As you arrive at midnight, the iron gates creak open on their own, and you smell flowers blooming impossibly in the winter air.

choices.text: Follow the scent of flowers into the garden
Enter the mansion first to explore

nodes.title: Echoing Halls
nodes.narration: The mansion swallows you in velvet darkness. Oil portraits watch from the walls, and the air hums with a note you feel more than hear. Moonlight leaks through fractured stained glass, painting the floor in sapphire patterns.

choices.text: Follow the humming through the corridor
Force the sealed study door open

nodes.title: Glimmering Vision
nodes.narration: As your fingers brush the bloom, liquid light pours through you. Your pulse syncs with the garden and you glimpse memories that are not yours—moonlit dances, whispered vows, a lonely gardener tending petals that outlive every season.

choices.text: Let the vision pull you deeper
Break contact and steady yourself

nodes.title: Moonbound Conservatory
nodes.narration: A domed conservatory waits beyond a curtain of ivy. Inside, instruments of brass and crystal hang like constellations, each tremor of the humming note setting them aglow. A hidden door is edged with frost, exhaling midnight air.

choices.text: Follow the humming toward the hidden door
Clip a glowing bloom to show Elias
choices.description: Carry proof back to the garden

nodes.title: Ancestral Study
nodes.narration: Dust billows as the sealed study yields. Ledgers, maps, and a portrait of a woman who shares your eyes crowd the shelves. A silver key shaped like a crescent rests atop a velvet journal, waiting for someone to claim it.

choices.text: Open the velvet-bound journal
Pocket the silver crescent key

nodes.title: Pulse of Starlight
nodes.narration: The energy you pulled back coils inside your chest like a captured comet. Every heartbeat sends sparks down your arms, and the flowers nearest you bloom brighter, bending toward your warmth.

choices.text: Channel the power into the mansion\
Hold the power within and return to Elias
choices.description: Test whether you can bridge both worlds

nodes.title: Oath of Thornewood
nodes.narration: The journal reveals a pact struck a century ago: the first heir able to see the midnight blooms must choose to keep the garden between worlds or seal it forever. Elias remains bound until that choice is made with a willing heart.

choices.text: Swear to uphold the ancient vow
Decide to rewrite the pact entirely

nodes.title: Resonant Promise
nodes.narration: Standing within the circle of moonlight, you feel the garden attune to both your breaths. Elias speaks of dawns he has never witnessed and futures he no longer dares imagine.

choices.text: Step fully into the circle beside him
choices.description: Bind your rhythm to the garden

choices.text: Keep one foot in the mortal world
choices.description: Hold space for a shared dawn

nodes.title: Lunar Talisman
nodes.narration: The crescent key warms in your palm, unfolding into a talisman etched with constellations. You sense it can disrupt the enchantment—or redirect it—depending on whose name you speak.

choices.text: Use the talisman on the wrought-iron gate
choices.description: Test whether you can open a new doorway

choices.text: Reveal the talisman to Elias

nodes.title: Temporal Lantern
nodes.narration: Behind the humming door you find a lantern suspended in midair, its crystal core shattered into hovering fragments. Each shard holds a memory of the garden at different moons, suspended in time.

choices.text: Reforge the crystal with your new energy
Scatter the shards to break the loop

nodes.title: Breaking the Pact
nodes.narration: You challenge the oath, weaving new words into the air. The blooms flicker between fear and exhilaration while Elias steadies you, ready to follow wherever you lead.

choices.text: Shatter the binding to free you both
Draw the magic into yourself alone
choices.description: Carry the cost so Elias can leave

nodes.title: Aligned Heartbeats
nodes.narration: With the lantern restored, the garden hums in harmony. Moonlight and heartbeat blend until you cannot tell where you end and Elias begins.

choices.text: Stay in the midnight bloom with him
choices.description: Choose a life woven from starlight

choices.text: Guide the garden toward the coming dawn
choices.description: Share its magic with the waking world

nodes.title: Threshold of Dawn
nodes.narration: You hold the surge of magic without surrendering to it. The manor groans as the boundary between worlds thins, offering a path back to sunlight if you dare step through together.

choices.text: Lead Elias toward the waking world
Let the magic anchor you beside him

nodes.title: Unbound Time
nodes.narration: As the talisman flares and shards scatter, time stutters around the garden. Petals freeze mid-fall while distant church bells ring backward. You have seconds to decide what this new freedom will cost.

choices.text: Release the captured hours into the night
choices.description: Let the garden choose its fate

choices.text: Lock the garden away from time forever
choices.description: Seal the magic even if it wilts

nodes.title: Shared Sunrise
nodes.narration: You guide Elias beyond the gates as dawn breaks, carrying a single luminous bloom as proof the magic can survive the sun. The manor awakens to laughter, music, and a garden that finally welcomes daylight. Love and legacy take root in the open air.

nodes.title: Shattered Spell
nodes.narration: You release the trapped hours, breaking the oath that bound Elias. The garden erupts in a final blaze of light before the blooms dissolve into stardust. Freedom is yours, but the midnight wonder becomes a memory you both carry into unknown futures.

nodes.title: Fading Petals
nodes.narration: You seal the garden away to spare Elias the curse, but the magic withers without the moon. The manor grows quiet, the blooms preserved only in portraits and dreams. Every night you wonder if another choice might have saved the beauty you sacrificed.
